summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning; amending Sections 5.3, 14.2, 14.3, 15.2, 16.3, 17.2 and 17.3 of the Zoning Ordinance (86300) to permit new and substantially expanded or altered automobile service stations only as a conditional use in the BN and all more intensive zones, and to require certain landscaping of such service stations.
